Package com.ikalagaming.scripting

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Argument
    Either data or a function may be an argument
    ArgumentGroup
    Contains arguments and operators for use in functions.
    CommandString
    A string that is an element in a function.
    FunctionGroup
    A complete function.
    Group
    Contains one or more types of data.
    MethodGroup
    Contains a string representing the name of a node and a string representing a function contained in that node, separated by an operator which indicates the statement after the node is a function name.
    Operator
    Parentheses, periods, and other characters used in commands.
    Scanner  
    ScriptingSettings
    Contains settings for the scripting engine that may be modified to affect how the engine functions.
    ScriptToken
    A basic element that composes a function.
    SyntaxChecker Deprecated
    dude use Lua
    SyntaxCheckerTest
    Tests the functionality of the syntax checker.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ScanState
    Contains constants used in the scanner to keep track of what it is currently scanning
    TokenType
    Allows differentiation between the contents of commandComponents based on what they represent.
